title: Bug 121111Bad event handler class name does not cause an error
description: Bug 121111Bad event handler class name does not cause an error The report executes normally. (Tested with the 20051215 nightly build)
EB: No error is shown.Event handlers are an integral part of a report design, and if a script handler class is not found, or if the handler throws a runtime exception, Report Engine should either stop the report execution, or show the error message in the generated report.
SR: Open a report design, open any Data Set's Property editor. Type in an invalid Java class name for the "Event Handler Class" property, say "aaa".Preview a report that uses that Data Set.
